name: Jason Shapiro From Crowded Market Report
title: Chart Of The Week Bitcoin
text:
Synopsis
Bitcoin's price movement remains constrained by current trader positioning, with Large Speculators maintaining a net-long stance and Small Speculators showing minimal bullish sentiment.

Key Insights
- Large Speculators continue to hold a net-long position in Bitcoin
- Bitcoin is currently trading at the lower end of its three-month range
- Small Speculators are at their least bullish level in one year, with an indexed value of zero
- The newsletter suggests potential price movement may depend on Large Speculators changing their positioning
- The new administration is noted to have a bullish stance on cryptocurrency, which could impact future market dynamics
